issue.message: Resource named '`flag_of_flags`' does not start with the project's resource prefix '`airalo_offer_`'; rename to '`airalo_offer_flag_of_flags`' ?
Resource named '`ic_arrow_right`' does not start with the project's resource prefix '`airalo_offer_`'; rename to '`airalo_offer_ic_arrow_right`' ?
Found bitmap drawable `res/drawable/flag_of_flags.png` in densityless folder
